Name: Color Path
About the game: Color Path is a minimal, logic puzzle game, where is your goal to set the movements of objects so that they reach the points without encountering or leaving the cell field Controls: select an object with mouse click, then press W,A,S,D to choose direction or Backspace to skip a move
